title: Eclipse33

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Holy shit. #1 we are all familiar with (I think) and it should hopefully be the least of threats. Still annoying ofc and a threat to anyone naive or new to this.#2 It always sucks hard when you suddenly notice some of your photos floating around in a scam attempt.#3 Is new to me and sounds like a terrible experience. Hopefully you having his full name and criminal record history will help in settling the "dispute" about the funds to your favour with ebay. Good luck and thanks for the warning.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Yes indeed, especially email spam, scam and skimming attempts have increased significantly over the last few months. Noticed that myself.I would actually expect this to increase even more for a while - my guess is a lot of this shit is getting automated with the use of AI right now.
